name: Sorry, No Visitors
description: Complete the Event Objectives to get Corporal D. Chang!

rewards.name: Honor
rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

participation_rewards.name: Honor
participation_rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

ship.name: NX-01 Enterprise
ship.flavor: The flagship of United Earth Starfleet, pivotal in founding the Coalition of Planets, a precursor to the UFP.

rewards.name: D. Chang
rewards.flavor: During the mission, Chang was tasked with guarding a hatchery for Xindi insectoids.

milestones.requirement: Level up Crew from Star Trek: Enterprise 30 times
Level up Crew from Star Trek: Enterprise 60 times

rewards.name: D. Chang
rewards.flavor: During the mission, Chang was tasked with guarding a hatchery for Xindi insectoids.

milestones.requirement: Level up Crew from Star Trek: Enterprise 90 times
Complete 50 Ship Battles using the NX-01 Enterprise
Complete 125 Ship Battles using the NX-01 Enterprise

rewards.name: D. Chang
rewards.flavor: During the mission, Chang was tasked with guarding a hatchery for Xindi insectoids.

milestones.requirement: Complete 250 Ship Battles using the NX-01 Enterprise

name: Critical Chroniton Levels!
description: Expend Chronitons in order to receive valuable Crew Retrieval rewards!

rewards.name: Quantum Energy
rewards.flavor: Quantum--a mortal term for Q energy--is needed in order to retrieve crew. Quantum will regenerate over time, but the Q can only hold so much at a time. Plan your crew retrieval operations in order to make efficient use of this resource. Quantum can be regenerated instantly in exchange for Dilithium.

participation_rewards.name: ISM
participation_rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.name: Skill
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 6 Polestars: Command, Diplomacy, Security, Engineering, Science, Medicine

rewards.name: ISM
rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

name: Advance Your Crew!
description: Complete the Event Objectives to earn Premium Crew Beholds!

rewards.name: Crew Behold
rewards.flavor: Choose from a selection of three random Legendary Premium Portal Crew

participation_rewards.name: Honor
participation_rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.name: Merits
rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

rewards.name: Honor
rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.flavor: Choose from a selection of three random Super Rare Premium Portal Crew

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.
